meta.label: Add ALB controller
meta.description: Add a controller on the cluster to create ingresses using ALB.

longDescription: Note: the VPC subnets that the ALB instances will use need to be tagged with *kubernetes.io/role/internal-elb* and *kubernetes.io/role/elb* to *1*

params.name: policyName
params.label: IAM policy
params.description: Name of a policy to use or create (default: ALBIngressControllerIAMPolicy)
